integrate_head: Integrate TexKoop’s Solution Into Your Retail Service.
integrate_text: Run a retail enterprise? Subscribe to TexKoop’s enterprise service and have our solution seamlessly built in to handle your orders in real-time.
select: We collect this data for the purposes of processing your application. By clicking this box, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the privacy policy and terms of service.*Required
ride_text: No Prior Experience is required. However, honesty and commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction is ideally a top requirement with ask.
select_2: We collect this data for the purposes of processing your application.  By clicking this box, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the privacy policy and terms of service.
expect_text: We believe in rewarding our personnel for good performance and incentivising them with a good working environment that spurs their commitment to fostering excellence.
card_a_text: We care about your safety. You are provided a helmet and tracked in real-time.
card_b_text: Earnings from gigs are based on distance, delivery time, and rider score.
card_c_text: As you complete gigs, your rider score grows and you earn more.
card_d_text: You can explore our financing option to acquire an electric bike for your use.
card_e_text: Once delivery is confirmed. Payment is logged. You choose a payout schedule.
card_f_text: You choose in real-time if you  are available to be matched to  gigs.
